question: Which companies have shifted their vendor partnerships in the past year and have also showcased leadership excerpts highlighting innovation?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have shifted their vendor partnerships in the past year. [CompanyDealMaster, CompanyVendorTechDetail]
Filter these companies to find those that have leadership excerpts highlighting innovation. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Combine the data to list companies with both shifted partnerships and innovation leadership excerpts. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
